HOME
CONTACT US
ABOUT
About US
Welcome to Bigfoot on the River, Tampa's most legendary riverside bar and hangout spot.
Bigfoot sightings in Florida go way back—but Tampa holds its own mysterious tale.
In the 1970s, locals swore they saw a massive creature lurking near the Hillsborough River.
Then again in the early 2000s, new reports surfaced. Today, that legend lives on—not just in stories, but right here at Bigfoot on the River.
We’re in the process of transforming our riverside bar and hangout into something even more inspired by the legend—where the beer is cold, the atmosphere is magnetic, and the experience is about to get even more unforgettable.
Bigfoot on the River —
Where Tampa’s legends come to life.

Where Tampa’s legends come to life.
